name: Train Subway 3D Driving Sim
description:
Subway 3D Control Simulator
Metro 3D Management Simulation - a life simulator operator subway train. Always wanted to live a real tough day metro train driver? Enjoy high-speed train on the tracks? A great responsibility to carry passengers from the bus stop to stop! It should be very careful to slow down and accelerate, that would not hurt people. Gently rotate the train composition directly to your phone! Control the train from the driver's cab!
People need you! They are rushing to work, school, college, store or other important matters! Your task is to get them as soon as possible! Metro - is the most rapid movement without traffic jams in the tunnel there is a lot of traffic! Play the best simulator subway for free and without an internet connection!
ATTENTION! The game was created for fun and jokes! The app does not bear any harm! The simulator only shows a subway from the cockpit!
Thank you for playing with us, leave us your comments and suggestions and we will make our game even better and more interesting for you!
